LanguageData.VFEM_DrankWine.stages.0.label: drank awful wine
LanguageData.VFEM_DrankWine.stages.0.description: I drank some must which has barely had any time to ferment. Disgusting.
LanguageData.VFEM_DrankWine.stages.1.label: drank poor wine
LanguageData.VFEM_DrankWine.stages.1.description: That wine could have had a few more days to ferment. It wasn't horrible but wasn't great either.
LanguageData.VFEM_DrankWine.stages.2.label: drank normal wine
LanguageData.VFEM_DrankWine.stages.3.label: drank good wine
LanguageData.VFEM_DrankWine.stages.4.label: drank excellent wine
LanguageData.VFEM_DrankWine.stages.4.description: I drank some fine wine. You can tell when it has had a good amount of time to mature.
LanguageData.VFEM_DrankWine.stages.5.label: drank masterwork wine
LanguageData.VFEM_DrankWine.stages.5.description: That wine was simply amazing! It doesn't get much better than this.
LanguageData.VFEM_DrankWine.stages.6.label: drank legendary wine
LanguageData.VFEM_DrankWine.stages.6.description: I've drank quite possibly some of the best wine I've ever tasted!
